name: Disengage The Simulator
description:
Game Story:

After a Science experiment gone wrong, you have been pulled into a computer Simulation you were building. Your only hope is to Navigate your way through your computer to get out.

Game Mechanics/Features:
This game is a frustrating combination of a Maze and Memory Game. Each time you fail a Level you go all the way back to Level 1 and start again. Every level can be solved in multiple ways - exit's are not Marked so it is a game of true trial and error.
